channel.title: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?
channel.description:
I've tried to download both the workstation 12 and gateway 12 but both of them stop at 268,3Mb and they should be 1,5 and 1,6Gb? VirtualBox gives an error that it can't make file...
File is not complete I guess? Could you fix this quickly because I would really like to try using both off them?
I could not find any other way to inform you about this.
Thank you in advance!

item.title: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?
item.dc:creator: MK71
item.description:
Ok So it does! My mistake I did not look that infoa careful enough.

Thank you and have nice day!

Read full topic

item.title: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

why? Everything checks out the way it’s supposed to, you may compare it with this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Verify_the_virtual_machine_images_using_the_command_line

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.source: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?

item.title: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?
item.dc:creator: MK71
item.description:
Verification failed on both of them…

Mac:downloads home$ gpg --verify-options show-notations --verify Whonix-Workstation-.ova.asc Whonix-Workstation-.ova
gpg: Signature made Mon Nov 16 18:12:18 2015 EET using RSA key ID 77BB3C48
gpg: Good signature from “Patrick Schleizer adrelanos@riseup.net” [unknown]
gpg: Signature notation: issuer-fpr@notations.openpgp.fifthhorseman.net=6E979B28A6F37C43BE30AFA1CB8D50BB77BB3C48

gpg: Signature notation: file@name=Whonix-Workstation-12.0.0.3.2.ova

gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature!
gpg: There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner.
Primary key fingerprint: 916B 8D99 C38E AF5E 8ADC 7A2A 8D66 066A 2EEA CCDA
Subkey fingerprint: 6E97 9B28 A6F3 7C43 BE30 AFA1 CB8D 50BB 77BB 3C48

item.title: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?
item.dc:creator: MK71
item.description:
Ok thank you!

I started downloading both of them and now download shows the size of ova so it should be ok. Though ova sizes are bigger now than mentioned on the site gateway is 1,83Gb and workstation is 2,1Gb.

I will be back after the download and verification.

item.source: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?

item.title: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?
item.dc:creator: fortasse
item.description:
I think I’ve deployed a fix. Sorry for the trouble. Can you test again @MK71? I’ll edit with a confirmation when I download a complete OVA.
EDIT: Fix confirmed. Again, sorry for the trouble.
EDIT2: Oh, and thanks for the bug report. We just reworked our download infrastructure, so it’s helpful when people report issues.

item.description:

Tor browser stops at 256Mb…

item.title: Download file for Virtualbox for Mac is not complete?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

the files are definitely not complete. How did you download them? Normally, such issues don’t exist. Did you try downloading them a second time? Furthermore, please always verify them.

Have a nice day,

Ego
